Bitstamp adds WETH deposits and withdrawals on Polygon
WETH on Polygon is now live on Bitstamp! Experience fast, affordable transactions and enjoy the benefits of multi-chain support.

Your ETH transfers just got an upgrade! Bitstamp now lets you deposit and withdraw Wrapped Ethereum (WETH) on the Polygon network. This is just one more step in our journey to offer you more options with multi-chain support.

Now you can easily buy WETH on Bitstamp and transfer it via Polygon, making your crypto transactions faster and more affordable.

Why Polygon?

Faster transactions

With Polygon, you’ll enjoy near-instant transaction speeds, so you won’t have to wait around. Polygon’s quicker block times mean your WETH transfers happen in just a few seconds.

Lower fees

Polygon offers significantly lower transaction fees compared to Ethereum’s main network. This potentially helps you save more every time you move your WETH.

Easy deposits and withdrawals

We’ve made it simple for you to deposit and withdraw WETH using Polygon. Just a few clicks, and you’re done. No hassle, no fuss.

Embracing a multi-chain future

This addition is part of our ongoing commitment to making your crypto experience as flexible and efficient as possible. By supporting multiple networks like Polygon, we’re giving you the freedom to choose the best option for your needs, whether it’s speed, cost, or convenience.

How it works

When you’re ready to deposit or withdraw WETH on Bitstamp, simply select Ethereum as the cryptocurrency and Polygon as the network, enter the destination wallet address, and you’re good to go.

If you want to dive deeper into what makes Ethereum and Polygon unique, check out our Learn Center articles on What is Ethereum (ETH)? and What is Polygon (MATIC)?.
